name: Super Bash Fighters
description:
Shoot your adversary down, off the edge or through the roof!  Grab a power up to try your luck at getting a better weapon. Fight with a friend for endless rounds and see who ends on top.

I started this project thinking of doing something similar to Super Smash Bros, but ended up going more for a StickFight : The game style of gameplay.

Disclaimers :
- As my first multiplayer game, I coded a very specific input system : one player plays on Keyboard and mouse, the other on a PS4 Controller. Any other/additionnal input source will probably not work as intended / at all.
